About Me

Let Me Tell You A Few Things About Myself...

BIO

Aditya Rawat is an experienced 14 year old high schooler, web developer, and programmer. Driven by life's obstacles, he takes pride in providing you with the best portfolio website possible. As an 9th grader, his goals include building a full scale gaming PC and to be able to maintain absolute focus. In addition to his primary awesomeness, Aditya Rawat has been recognized by himself for his extraordinary commitment to finding the loopholes in everything.

Soccer Player

High School Soccer Player

I began playing soccer at 6 years old. I used to play recreational leagues before playing club. Eventually, I stopped because I was taking more interst in swimming and tennis, but always played for fun. When I began high school, I started to play soccer more seriously and made it on the high school soccer team. We'll see what happens...

Code Orange

FRC Team 3476

I began to participate in FRC Team 3476 in 2018, and we went to World Champs for the 7th consecutive time. I was on the CAD team and the manufacturing team, really creating the robot. This is my first year, so not a lot. But I'm constantly getting better at what I'm doing and trying new things.

Web Developer

Currently Unemployed

I began creating websites in 6th grade, starting off with template website creators, like Wix and Weebly. But later, over the summer I learned how to make my own website with HTML and CSS. I worked on a few and then made this one after forgetting for a long time. But now it works so, progress.
